tool.name: Merge PCR duplicates
tool.help:
Merge PCR duplicates according to random barcode library. All alignments with same outer coordinates and barcode will be merged into a single crosslinking event.
Barcodes containing uncalled base 'N' are removed.
Input: * bed6 file containing alignments with fastq read-id in name field * fastq library of random barcodes
Output: * bed6 file with a read id from a representative alignment in the name field and number of PCR duplicates as score, sorted by fields chrom, start, stop, strand, name
